reviews.author: Oliver
reviews.headline: I love this product!
reviews.body: This sofa has completely changed my life. The delivery process couldn't have been easier. I want to sing about Oliver Space from the rooftops!

reviews.author: new
reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.body: Would rent this dining room table one hundred times over.

reviews.author: Sanjeev
reviews.headline: Not that soft
reviews.body: Sofa needs to be more soft

reviews.author: Sanjeev
reviews.headline: Too Plain
reviews.body: Kind of comfy, but just too plain

reviews.author: Sanjeev
reviews.headline: Could be more fancy
reviews.body: Pretty fancy, but could use some more fancyness. 4 stars.

reviews.author: Derek
reviews.headline: Huge? More like tiny
reviews.body: This rug needs to be at least 3 times bigger.
